Title: Requires the division of housing and community renewal to calculate the period of rent reduction due to diminution of services from the date of actual diminution of the services
Summary: Requires the division of housing and community renewal to calculate the period of rent reduction due to diminution of services from the date of actual diminution of the services.
LawCode: Amd §7, Emerg Ten Prot Act of 1974; amd §§26-514 & 26-405, NYC Ad Cd; amd §4, Emerg Hous Rent Cont L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the emergency tenant protection act of nineteen seventy-four, the administrative code of the city of New York and the emergency housing rent control law, in relation to requiring the division of housing and community renewal to calculate the period of rent reduction due to diminution of services from the date of actual diminution of the services
